title: Sex is Our Only Real Issue
description:
Abby and Rob would like to work on improving the quality of their sex life. - Dr. Laura: "Sensuality and sex are important parts of caring for yourself."

What would make you happier with your sex life? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
